roleset.name: become damaged, cease to operate

example.name: Also for non-physical failure
example.text: His warning came after the breakdown of talks in London.

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to break.12. Break.12 is a member of VN class break-45.1. Framed by Katie.

roleset.name: reach the mental breaking point and suffer the effects

role.descr: theme, type of break down (ie mental, nervous)

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Slight comparison with break.11. No VN class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Arg 1
example.text: Each of these travelers appeared to have suffered from some form of nervous breakdown.

example.name: Args 0 and 2
example.text: This footage was taken after her breakdown into tears

example.name: another form of arg 1
example.text: Cary suffered what was termed an emotional breakdown.
